metadata.title: Sea-Floor Sediment Heavy Metals Datasets for the Bering and Chukchi Sea

creators.name: U.S. Geological Survey (USGS), Biological Resources Division, Alaska Science Center (ASC)

metadata.description: This is a database of references to surface-sediment heavy metal concentration data in the Bering and Chukchi Seas. It indexes raw data, reports, statistical reviews, and maps.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To support Pacific walrus research at the Alaska Biological Science Center.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Irregular

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None

Distribution liability: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system.
